404_2: Do not panic, we can help you.
SECURITY_CODE_MANDATORY: The security code is mandatory for create an operator account
ENGINEALLOWDUPLICATESSERIES: Allow songs with duplicate series or singers in playlists
ENGINEFREEUPVOTES: Allow users to upvote songs to free them
ENGINEFREEUPVOTESREQUIREDMIN: Minimum votes required to free a song
ENGINEFREEUPVOTESREQUIREDPERCENT: Percentage of upvotes / online users required to to free a song
ENGINEENABLESMARTINSERT: Enable smart insert of songs to avoid user monopolies
ENGINESONGPOLLCHOICES: Number of songs users can choose from during public poll
STREAM_TWITCH_OAUTH_TOKEN_GET: Get your OAuth Token Twitch here
CLASSIC_MODE_TOOLTIP: A pause will take place between each song and the name of the next song as well as its requester will be displayed on the screen. The song requester or operator will be able to start playing the song
CLASSIC_MODE_TEXT_MODAL: Click on the Play button to start your song.
PLAYLIST_SMART_SHUFFLE: Smart shuffle playlist (for better group experience)

BLC.COPY_TO: Copy criterias to the following list :

CL_HELP_DISCORD: Come to our {{- discord}} if you have any questions!
CL_HELP_PUBLIC_MOBILE:
Click on the button at the top right of the screen to go from search mode to playlist mode.
Tap a song to see its details.
CL_HELP_PUBLIC_MOBILE_RESTRICTED: The app was put in restricted mode by the karaoke operator.
CL_HELP_PUBLIC_MOBILE_RESTRICTED_DESCRIP: You can't add any more songs for now, but you can see the one playing and the current playlist by click on the top button.
CL_ADD_RANDOM_TITLE: How many random songs do you want to add?
CL_DELETE_CRITERIAS_PLAYLIST: Delete criterias blacklist of type '{{type}}' that contains all this songs :
GOTO_TOP: Go to the start of the playlist
GOTO_PLAYING: Go to the kara currently playing
GOTO_BOTTOM: Go to the end of the playlist

LOG_OFFLINE.TITLE: Instance offline
LOG_OFFLINE.MESSAGE: Changes to your profile will not be registered

CONFIRM_FAV_IMPORT: Overwrite your favorites with this import?
DELETE_ACCOUNT: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
TOOLTIP_ADDKARA: Add this song to the playlist
TOOLTIP_ADDKARA_ADMIN: Right click to append it after the currently playing song
TOOLTIP_TRANSFERKARA: Transfer this song - right click to transfer it after the currently playing song
TOOLTIP_UPVOTE: Free this kara from user's quota
TOOLTIP_PLAYKARA_LIBRARY: Play this song directly (doesn't add it to the current playlist)

DISCORD.DISPLAY_ACTIVITY: Show Karaoke Mugen activity on your Discord profile

PLAYER.LABEL: Player
PLAYER.PROGRESS_BAR_DOCK: Play progress bar in Dock / Taskbar
PLAYER.HARDWARE_DECODING_TOOLTIP: Forces or not the player's hardware acceleration. Note: on some configurations, it can cause unexpected behavior during playback. In such cases, select "Disabled". The "Automatic" option is the safest, and "Force" the most risky/not recommended

KARAOKE.LABEL: Karaoke
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_RANDOMSONGSAFTEREND: Play random songs after playlist ends
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_RANDOMSONGSAFTEREND_TOOLTIP: At the end of your current playlist, Karaoke Mugen will play random songs from the library until someone adds a song (if autoplay is enabled)
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_RANDOMSONGSAFTERENDMESSAGE: Display an on-screen message regularly to invite users to add a song when randomly playing after playlist end
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_INTRO_VIDEOS_TOOLTIP: Intro videos are played only once if you start playing the first song of the current playlist. A sponsor jingle video follows, if available.
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_INTRO_VIDEOS_MESSAGE_TOOLTIP: The message will be displayed on screen during the intro video
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_OUTRO_VIDEOS_TOOLTIP: Outro videos are played only once after the last song of the current playlist.
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_OUTRO_VIDEOS_MESSAGE_TOOLTIP: The message will be displayed on screen during the outro video
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_ENCORES_VIDEOS_TOOLTIP: This video will played before the last song of the current playlist.
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_ENCORES_VIDEOS_MESSAGE_TOOLTIP: The message will be displayed on screen during the encores video
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_SPONSORS_VIDEOS_INTERVAL: Number of songs between sponsor video
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_SPONSORS_VIDEOS_INTERVAL_TOOLTI: Number of songs before a sponsor video appears on the screen. 0 to deactivate sponsors
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_JINGLES_VIDEOS_INTERVAL_TOOLTIP: Number of songs before a jingle appears on the screen. 0 to deactivate jingles
KARAOKE.QUICKSTART_TOOLTIP: This disables data verification. You will have to generate your database in case of modification manually from the system panel, database tab.

INTERFACE.LABEL: Interface
INTERFACE.ALLOW_VIEW_BLACKLIST_CRITERIAS: Allow users to view blacklist criterias

FREE_AUTO_TIME: Songs are freed from quota after (min)
ONLINESTATS: Send usage telemetry to Karaoke Mugen Online
ONLINEERRORTRACKING: Send error and crash reports (via sentry.io)
KARA_SUGGESTION_NOT_FOUND: Can't find your favorite song? Click here
KARA_SUGGESTION_DOWNLOAD: Check if the song is not available for download
KARA_SUGGESTION_GITLAB_ADMIN: click here to make an add suggestion.
KARA_SUGGESTION_LINK: You will soon be able to see it at this address :

ONLINE_STATS.TITLE: Stats
ONLINE_STATS.INTRO: Karaoke Mugen can send anonymous information about your instance to Karaoke Mugen Server to establish usage statistics.

DETAILS.1: Which karaokes are favorited (but not by whom)
DETAILS.3: Which karaokes gott requested (but not by whom)
DETAILS.4: Information about the computer (CPU, available RAM, OS name and version ...)
DETAILS.5: Application' settings (excluding any private info like password)
DETAILS.TITLE: Details of sent informations
DETAILS.OUTRO: Stats are sent at each startup, then at each hour of use. You can consult the information sent in the Karaoke Mugen log directory.

ONLINE_STATS.CHANGE: You can change your choice at any time from the options.
ONLINE_STATS.QUESTION: Do you agree to send these statistics to Karaoke Mugen Server?
ONLINE_STATS.ERROR: Karaoke Mugen may send information about your instance to Sentry.io during errors. This helps us solve them as they come up much faster. Do you agree to send these error reports ?

SELECT_KARAS_REQUIRED: You have to select at least one song
MAKE_ACCOUNT_ADMIN_MESSAGE: If you want to make your account an operator account, write the 6 numbers security code and validate.
INTRO_ADMIN_INTRO1:
Welcome to Karaoke Mugen!

Karaoke Mugen uses an account system to manage and enjoy your karaoke.
There are three account types : operator, user, and guest. To manage your karaoke session, you'll need an operator account. (like the one created in setup wizard)
INTRO_ADMIN_INTRO2:
Input a username and password, or if you already own an online account, use it on the Login tab.
If you don't want an online account, disable the toggle.
The security code is visible in the Karaoke Mugen menu. This code will allow you to create an operator account or make your existing account into one, in case you forgot your own account's password.

You can modify your nickname later, but not your username !
INTRO_ADMIN_EMAIL_ONLINE: When creating an online account, remember to modify your profile to add an email address so that you can recover your password if you forget it!
INTRO_ADMIN_INTRO3:
Your Karaoke Mugen is configured, we are now going to show you how it works.

To redo this guided tour, go to the config page, toggle the App.FirstRun setting.
INTRO_ADMIN_PLAYLISTS: Here are your playlists. You can manage them from this screen. We will learn more on them later.
INTRO_ADMIN_LECTEUR:
Here is the control panel.
You can manage your karaoke as you wish.
We have selected 5 random songs from your collection to have a playlist ready to play. Press Play to test it out.
INTRO_ADMIN_MODE:
There are two main modes in Karaoke Mugen, private and public. This button allows you to switch from one to the other.

- Private (default) : When someone adds a song, it goes directly into the current playlist and will be played when the time comes.

- Public : Songs added go to the public playlist as a "suggestion". This list isn't read by the player, it's up to the operator (you!) to choose songs and transfer them to the current playlist so the player can play them!
INTRO_ADMIN_MYSTERY: You can choose to add invisible or visible songs to your guests by choosing NOrmal Add or Mystery Add. Perfect for surprises !
INTRO_ADMIN_PLAYLISTS_2:
But let's go back to playlists.
There are several types :

- The Library is your song database. This is where your users are going to search for songs they want to add.

- The list with the Current attribute is the one displayed on the screen.

- The list with the Public attribute is the one where your public will enter their suggestions. Useful only in public mode.

- Lists with a hidden attribute are invisible to your public. Disable it if you want to hide some lists !
INTRO_ADMIN_PLAYLISTS_MANAGE: Here, you can choose which playlist to display, change its properties or search inside.
INTRO_ADMIN_PLAYLISTS_MANAGE_BUTTON:
This button allows you to show advanced actions.
Press it to continue.
INTRO_ADMIN_PLAYLISTS_MANAGE_ADVANCED:
In advanced mode, you can act on several songs at once by selecting them first.
Use the action buttons like or .

There are other advanced actions available, hover your mouse over a button to see what it does.

The possible actions are depending on playlists displayed on the left and the right
INTRO_ADMIN_SETTINGS:
Your karaoke session is very customizable via its options panel.
You can access it by pressing this button.
INTRO_ADMIN_SETTINGS_SCREEN:
This is where you can configure Karaoke Mugen. Try out different settings to see what suits you best.
Some of them will only be taken into account after the current song ends.
INTRO_ADMIN_INTRO_DOWNLOAD:
Note : to be able to use the public interface, your users will need to be on the same Wifi network as you.

If you want more songs than the default ones provided here, go to the system panel to browse through the online database and choose which songs you'd like to get, or download everything.
INTRO_ADMIN_INTROFINAL:
We're done! You can now sing!

Thanks for reading this far. We are now going to disable the Dummy Plug System so you can pilot your EV... karaoke.

Read more :

- Documentation
- FAQ
- Contact the team (twitter / discord)
INTRO_PUBLIC_INTRO1:
Welcome to Karaoke Mugen!

You will be able to add your favorite songs to the playlist during this karaoke session.

If you like, you can create a new account. If not, click on Continue as guest.
INTRO_PUBLIC_PROGRESSBAR: You can see the current song's title here..
INTRO_PUBLIC_SEARCH: If you want to add a song, you can search for it in this box.
INTRO_PUBLIC_SEARCHRESULT:
You can scroll the list as you wish.

To add a song, simply click on .
INTRO_PUBLIC_KARA: Tap a karaoke song to display detailed information and advanced actions.
INTRO_PUBLIC_KARA_WIDE: To display detailed information on a song and other advanced actions, click on the button on the left
INTRO_PUBLIC_KARADETAILS:
In this new display, there are buttons to:
show lyrics,
add the song to favorites,
watch a video preview.
INTRO_PUBLIC_FOOTER: The arrows take you to the top or the bottom of the list. The numbers displayed next specify which portion of the list is displayed.
INTRO_PUBLIC_FAVORITES: Also, you can filter the list here, showing for example the most recently added songs, or your favorites (an account is needed)
INTRO_PUBLIC_CHANGE_SCREEN: Click on the button to see the rest of the app.
INTRO_PUBLIC_PLAYLISTS_LIKE:
The playlist screen allows you to browse through different lists.
Depending on the karaoke mode, your songs are added directly to the current playlist or to the public playlist, different from the current list.

You can also « like » a suggestion if you think it's good enough. Popular suggestions won't count into the quota of the user who requested them.
INTRO_PUBLIC_PLAYLISTS:
The playlist screen allows you to browse through different lists.
Depending on the karaoke mode, your songs are added directly to the current playlist or to the public playlist, different from the current list.
INTRO_PUBLIC_CHANGE_SCREEN2: Click on the button to get back to the search screen.
INTRO_PUBLIC_MENU:
Here's the K menu.

allows you to log out and switch users.

You can click on the clover button to add a random song!

You can go through this tutorial again with .
INTRO_PUBLIC_MENU_2:
will allow you to edit your profile and see who's logged in.

It is also possible to replace the currently playing song title by its lyrics with the switch button / .
INTRO_PUBLIC_MENU_PC:
Here's the K menu. will allow you to edit your profile and see who's logged in.

You can go through this tutorial again with .

allows you to log out and switch users.
INTRO_PUBLIC_MENU_PC_2:
It is also possible to replace the currently playing song title by its lyrics with the switch button "Toggle karaoke title" / "Toggle lyrics"

You can click on the clover button to add a random song!
USER_SONG_PLAYS_IN: Your song {{kara}} has been added and will airing in {{time}} ({{date}})

UNKNOW_KARAS.TITLE: Unknown songs detected
UNKNOW_KARAS.DESCRIPTION: This playlist contains songs you do not have yet locally. We found them on your configured online repositories. These songs won't appear in the playlist until they've been downloaded.
UNKNOW_KARAS.DOWNLOAD_THEM: Do you want to download them?

MODAL.PLAY_CURRENT_MODAL: Warning : the current playlist '{{playlist}}' isn't displayed on screen. That's the playlist going to be played. Are you sure you want to start playing?

SETUP_PAGE.TITLE: Setup Wizard
SETUP_PAGE.NEED_ACCOUNT: Before you can start singing, you'll need an account to use the app.
SETUP_PAGE.ACCOUNT_QUESTION: Do you want to use a local account (on your computer only) or an online account (Internet access required) ?
SETUP_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCOUNT_DESC: An online account allows you to:
SETUP_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCOUNT_SAVE_INFOS: Backup your favorite songs, avatar and profile info to get them again from one computer to another.
SETUP_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCOUNT_LOST_PASSWORD: If you supply an email address, you'll be able to recover your account if you forget your password.
SETUP_PAGE.LOCAL_ACCOUNT_DESC: You chose a local account. Type in an account name and a password below:
SETUP_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCOUNT_INSTANCE: Yout online account will be hosted on the {{instance}} instance
SETUP_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCOUNT_INSTANCE_DESC: An instance is an online service providing several services to Karaoke Mugen. If you're not sure, leave the default instance ({{instance}}), or if you know what you're doing, change it to the instance of your choice.
SETUP_PAGE.CREATE_ONLINE_ACCOUNT: I want to create a new account
SETUP_PAGE.CREATE_ONLINE_ACCOUNT_DESC: Type in an account name and a password to create one.
SETUP_PAGE.SECURITY_CODE_DESC_ELECTRON: Please also enter the 6-digit security code that you can find in the "Security Code" menu from the app's menu bar.
SETUP_PAGE.SECURITY_CODE_DESC_CONSOLE: Please also enter the 6-digit security code that you can find by looking for "SECURITY CODE FOR THIS SESSION" in the Karaoke Mugen log file or in the console.
SETUP_PAGE.SECURITY_CODE_USE: This code makes sure you're really the one doing these actions. It changes after each use.
SETUP_PAGE.CONNECTED_MESSAGE: Congratulations, you're logged in to Karaoke Mugen, {{user}} !
SETUP_PAGE.DEFAULT_REPOSITORY_DESC_1: Karaoke Mugen has a default karaokes repository,
SETUP_PAGE.DEFAULT_REPOSITORY_QUESTION: Where do you want to store these downloads? By default they'll be in:
SETUP_PAGE.REPOSITORY_NEED_SPACE: To download all the content from that repository, you'll need a lot of disk space (up to several hundred gigabytes). You can change this folder at any time.
SETUP_PAGE.DOWNLOAD_RANDOM_SONGS: Do you want Karaoke Mugen to download 6 songs at random from the default repository ({{instance}}) ? This will allow you to test the app with a few songs before downloading new ones..

TASKS.CLEANING_REPO: Cleaning up songs removed from repository

ERROR_CODES.BLC_COPY_ERROR: Error copying blacklist criterias to another set
